home.title-home: Global Voice and SMS Connectivity: Simplified, Reliable, and Scalable
home.description-home: Direct carrier routes, enterprise-grade SMS, and crystal-clear VoIP termination, powered by carrier-grade reliability.

featured-services.title-featured-services: Power your global communications with AlkaIP, trusted by carriers worldwide.
featured-services.feat2: High delivery rates with real-time analytics.
featured-services.feat3: Voice and messaging at your fingertips.

product-demo.desc-product: From call centers to large operators, Alkaip provides flexible and robust tools to enhance your global communication.

change-text-sms.2: RCS, SS7, VOTP, Whatsapp, Telegram, Viber

product-demo.desc-card-voice: minutes of voice calls per year with premium routes and guaranteed quality on every call.
product-demo.desc-card-sms: Scale your business with SMS Speed, security, and global coverage within reach of your brand.
product-demo.demo-desc1: We offer voice and SMS termination to any destination, with direct routes and competitive prices.
product-demo.demo-desc2: We manage large volumes of traffic and notifications with clear billing and no hidden charges.
product-demo.demo-desc3: Reliable connectivity through SS7 and SMPP protocols for maximum availability in your communications.
product-demo.demo-desc4: Services designed for low latency, high availability, and stability in demanding and scalable environments.
